think_procedure: First, I read the description of the knob. The knob 'parallel_tuple_cost' is a numerical knob that sets the planner's estimate of the cost of transferring one tuple from a parallel worker process to another process. The default value is 0.1. The description does not mention any special values that would change the function of the knob, such as disabling a feature. Therefore, it behaves like a regular numerical knob.
